name: LIQUIDIUMâ€¢TOKEN (Runes)
description: Liquidium is a peer-to-peer Bitcoin lending platform that leverages unique Bitcoin-based assets such as Ordinal Inscriptions (Ordinals) and Runes as collateral. The platform facilitates borrowing and lending of Bitcoin in a secure and non-custodial manner through Partially Signed Bitcoin Transactions (PSBTs) and Discreet Log Contracts (DLCs) on the Bitcoin Layer-1 network. Users can borrow Bitcoin against their assets without selling them, and lenders can earn yield by lending their Bitcoin.
